location: Near Da'an Forest Park, 24 meters from Xinhai MRT Station exit, near Dragon Gate Junior High School
notes: Large 5BR/2BA entire floor unit (60 ping) with elevator access in 10-story building. Fully furnished with appliances, 2 balconies, natural gas cooking permitted. Excellent location adjacent to Da'an Forest Park provides green space for family. Unable to assess modernity or baby safety details (balcony railings, sharp corners) without interior photos. Management fee and 2-month deposit required.
